Class AlertUtil

java.lang.Object
hr.ekufrin.training.util.AlertUtil
public class AlertUtil extends Object

    • checkStringInput

      public static void checkStringInput(String input, String message, StringBuilder errors)
      Checks if the input is a string
      Parameters:
      input - - input to check
      message - - message to append to errors if input is not string / is blank
      errors - - errors to append to

    • checkIntegerInput

      public static Integer checkIntegerInput(String input, String messageBlank, String messageRange, String messageInvalidFormat, StringBuilder errors)
      Checks if the input is an integer
      Parameters:
      input - - input to check
      messageBlank - - message to append to errors if input is blank
      messageRange - - message to append to errors if input is not in range
      messageInvalidFormat - - message to append to errors if input is not an integer
      errors - - errors to append to
      Returns:
      - integer if input is valid, 0 otherwise
